job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p>SGA's Data Analytics (DA) team requires a self-learning Data Scientist, to solve complex analytics&nbsp;problems for our US based global Media clients. Our team of&nbsp;60+ Data Engineers + Data scientists already use multiple available open source and licensed tools in the market&nbsp;to solve complex problems and drive business decisions.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>What you will be responsible for -&nbsp;</p><p>• Identify valuable data sources and automate collection processes</p><p>• Work directly with the stakeholders on analytics framework model building, database design, and deployment strategies</p><p>• Undertake pre-processing of structured and unstructured data</p><p>• Analyze large amounts of information to discover trends and patterns and present information using data visualization techniques</p><p>• Apply advanced statistical and predictive modeling techniques to build, maintain, and improve on multiple real-time decision systems</p><p>• Propose analytic solutions and strategies to business challenges</p><p>• Dive into data, clean it up, and pull-out insights that can be used to improve system performance and present to senior leaders with recommendations on business actions</p><p>• Develop and test models using appropriate tools and technologies and deploying the same in the production environment using continuous delivery practices&nbsp;</p><p>• Assist the development team with productization of successful algorithms, ensuring your work continues to drive value at scale</p><p><br></p><p>What you should have -&nbsp;</p><ul><li>5+ years of overall industry experience specifically in data engineering&nbsp;and analytics</li><li>4+ years of experience building and deploying large scale data processing and analytics pipelines in a production environment&nbsp;</li><li>Broad experience building different types of advanced analytic solutions, including some of the following: time series analysis, cluster analysis, tree-based algorithms, generalized linear models, text analytics, or neural networks</li><li>Strong experience in building data pipelines and analysis processes using Python and PySpark</li><li>Familiarity&nbsp;&nbsp;with DevOps systems, such as GitLab</li><li>Understanding the concepts of API and their integration with any&nbsp;&nbsp;coding language</li><li>Database architecture, maintenance and usage of Redshift</li><li>Experience with TB or PB size datasets preferred</li></ul>
